body_content.explanation: any of several types of melon (= a large, round fruit with hard skin and sweet flesh), such as honeydew and cantaloupe:
examples: This oval muskmelon has a super-sweet orange flesh that makes it perfect for anything from smoothies to fruit salad.
A cantaloupe, also called a musk melon, is one of the most common types of melon found in North America.
Muskmelon varieties can have orange, green, golden, or pale yellow to white flesh.
